Summary: triangular shape cloud with tail flies against wind direction- stops overhead, dissipates
divs: sighting detailsi am adding this video footage to a previously submitted report from a year ago. a distinctly non conforming cloud that appeared where twice before i have observed contrails in geometrically \ angularly laid paths. i have also recently observed a blinking star that " turned off " two nights in a row in the same location in the sky. very perucliar. the blinks were at roughly 15 second pauses. thats another report i guess.
